name: Navid Nikaein
content: Sign in Â· GitLab Welcome to EURECOM Gitlab Server It is strictly reserved for EURECOM staff and their partners and should be used only for your professional activity. If you have a @eurecom.fr account, please use EURECOM tab ! For username field, use your loginname. For password field, use your Linux password. Else, for guests or if you don't have a @eurecom.fr account, use External tab to create an account or to log in with your external domain email address ðŸ“¤. Only some specific email domain addresses are authorized to sign up. If your professional email address is forbidden, please ask your EURECOM contact for authorization. gmail.com, yahoo.com, qq.com and all public email domains are banned ðŸš«. If a message cannot be delivered to the recipient because the e-mail address in the profile no longer exists, we will block the account. Users should contact it@eurecom.fr to unblock their account and specify their new address. Project managers: If you want to invite someone from EURECOM, please use the firstname.name@eurecom.fr email address format. EURECOM Standard Username Password Remember me Sign in Username or primary email Password Forgot your password? Remember me Sign in Don't have an account yet?
